articles.title: America's Cup: Team NZ developing hydrogen powered foiling chase boats - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Defenders committed to drive hydrogen innovation in marine industry and hope this technology can roll into next generation of Cup yachts.
articles.content:
Team New Zealand are developing hydrogen powered foiling chase boats to be used in the next Americas Cup.
 The defenders are working with Christchurch-based company AFCryo on the prototype . They ha… [+2707 chars]
